name: Mirage (itch) (Madster_Rabbitt)
description:
Look in the mirror. What do you see? It Is Not Real. Or is it more real than reality itself?

As you walk through the Escher inspired halls of Mirage you will need to solve the puzzles to open the doors. Can you find the answers? 

---

This game was created for Brackeys game jam 2022.1. It is our first released Unity game and our first 3d game. Lots of learning was done!

We would like to send our appreciation to the Brackeys team for setting up the event, as well as to all the free asset providers who made our lives a whole lot easier:

  • Kenney for 3D Models and Sound Effects 
  • Mixamo for Character Model and Animations 
  • Poly Haven for Textures
  • Jake Francis South for the fantastic Music
  • And finally M.C. Escher for inspiring us

We couldn't have done it without you!

Thank you for having a look at our game. We hope you enjoy playing it and if you have any constructive feedback we'd love to hear it.
